Texts.Chs: 使用双手近战武器时，其基础攻击力增加至120%。
Texts.Eng: 130% Base Power with Two-Handed Melee Weapons.

Texts.Chs: 按[W]激活界限突破。在界限突破期间，获得+100%物理抗性，击退免疫和无限能量。界限突破持续10秒，冷却时间为60秒。每个在界限突破激活时时被杀死的敌人，都会延长其2秒的激活时间，并使冷却时间降低5秒。激活时间可以无限延长，但冷却时间只能减少到最少30秒。
Texts.Eng: Press [W] to activate Limit Break. During Limit Break, gain +100% Physical Resistance, Knockback Immunity, and Infinite Energy. Limit Break lasts for 10 Seconds and has a cooldown of 60 Seconds. For every enemy killed while Limit Break is active, gain 2 Seconds of active time and decrease cooldown by 5 Seconds. Active time can be extended indefinitely, but cooldown time can only be reduced to a minimum of 30 Seconds.

Texts.Chs: 主要攻击：按住以准备残酷挥击。提前释放减少造成的伤害。
Texts.Eng: Primary Fire: Hold to ready a brutal swing. Releasing early decreases damage dealt.

Texts.Chs: 次要攻击：按住为刀刃充能，释放时挥动。 这样会消耗掉所有剩余的能量，但会造成更高的伤害，攻击到更远的距离并燃烧目标。被这次攻击杀死的敌人会爆炸。
Texts.Eng: Secondary Fire: Hold to charge the blade with energy and release to swing. This consumes all remaining energy, but deals increased damage, reaches much farther, and burns targets. Enemies killed by this attack explode.

Texts.Chs: 速度随奔跑时间增长，但是改变方向却更难。随着速度增加，攻击增加最高达+200%。
Texts.Eng: Speed increases the longer you run, but changing directions is harder. As Speed increases, Power increases up to +200%.

Texts.Chs: ^red;未装备双手近战武器时，基础攻击力降低至20%。
Texts.Eng:
^red;20% Base Power while a
Two-Handed Melee Weapon is not equipped.
